official-title.#text:
To prevent certain Federal health care laws from
		  establishing health care provider standards of care in medical malpractice
		  cases, and for other purposes.

committee-name.#tail: , and in addition to the Committee on the

, for a period
			 to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of
			 such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee
			 concerned

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Standard of Care Protection Act of
			 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Construction
			 regarding health care provider standards of care

text.#text:
The development,
			 recognition, or implementation of any guideline or other standard under any
			 Federal health care provision shall not be construed to establish the standard
			 of care or duty of care owed by a health care provider to a patient in any
			 medical malpractice case.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: XIX of the Social Security Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: and the amendments made by that Act, and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Patient Protection and Affordable
			 Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act

term.#tail: means a medical malpractice action or claim (as defined in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section
			 431(7) of the Health Care Quality Improvement Act of 1986
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Health Care Quality Improvement Act of 1986/s:431/p:7

term.#tail:
includes the
			 District of Columbia, Puerto Rico, and any other commonwealth, possession, or
			 territory of the United States.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
or the
			 amendments made by that Act shall be construed to preempt any State law
			 governing medical professional liability cases.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act
